amendment.description: To provide an allocation of funding under the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 for the State of Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2175 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2175 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Stevens to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14511; text: CR S14511) To provide an allocation of funding under the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 for the State of Alaska.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2175 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2175 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Stevens to Amendment SA 2150.
